notes: The LLM reported 'safe' with 0 findings, but the contract contains a logic error in _incomingTokenBalance(). The function returns the full allowance (potentially type(uint256).max for unlimited approvals) instead of considering the user's actual token balance. This causes lock() to fail when users have unlimited allowances but insufficient token balances. The ground truth correctly identifies this as a medium-severity logic_error in _incomingTokenBalance(). Since the LLM found no issues, it missed the target vulnerability entirely.
